ItemTooltips.quelling_blade: SITUATIONAL ITEM but gives you a lot of lasthitting (or better denying) power and more importantly let's you set up insane ganks especially with guise and your ult.
ItemTooltips.ward_observer: Defensive ward for the river and the closest rune - hide the second behind your tower.
ItemTooltips.tango: Donate one of the tangos if your lane isn`t extremly contested.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: Just if noone has AC on your team.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Keep in mind that you can force allys to trees while "guising" them.
ItemTooltips.heart: Just if you're sure that they can't ignore you once it's up.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: SITUATIONAL ITEM. Buy it just if your opponent team has to be REALLY scared of you ult. Just walk in and force chaos.
ItemTooltips.blade_mail: Buy it and literally stand in your opponents way!
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: If you're unlikely to reach them go tranquil + soul ring or just soulring.
ItemTooltips.medallion_of_courage: SITUTATIONAL ITEM. Is usefull if early fighting is going on - or you want to rosh quickly (and the armor is great). Adapt your transition purely according to your midgame and the needs of your team.
ItemTooltips.smoke_of_deceit: A combination of smoke and guise creates opportunitys for ults.

AbilityTooltips.treant_natures_guise: Go for it on lvl 4 if your opponents don`t buy detection. If you do, max leech seed by 9 and go for the last lvl of living armor on lvl 10.
AbilityTooltips.treant_leech_seed: Your bread-and-butter-spell. Go for it on lvl 1 if you can get a kill with it or there is a lvl 1 teamfight.
AbilityTooltips.treant_living_armor: As you pull or do stuff, spam living armor to own your opponents laning.
AbilityTooltips.treant_overgrowth: Don`t hesitate if you have a good opportunity, since you might get a second one off in the same teamfight. On the other hand constantly threatening too ult might be a great disruption as well.
